= Conditional Includes

== Introduction

This document demonstrates conditional includes using ifdef directives.

== Flow Example

ifdef::flow[]
[source,java]
----
public class FlowExample {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("This is a Flow example");
    }
}
----
endif::[]

== React Example

ifdef::react[]
[source,jsx]
----
function ReactExample() {
  console.log("This is a React example");
  return <div>React Example</div>;
}
----
endif::[]

== Multiple Conditions

ifdef::flow[]
Flow content is visible.
endif::[]

ifdef::react[]
React content is visible.
endif::[]
